original_title: The Show Must Go On! - Live at the Palace Theatre
overview: Presented by Theatre Support Fund+, The Shows Must Go On! and National Theatre Live, the worldâ€™s most iconic musicals return to the West End stage with a stunning concert performance live from the Palace Theatre. With a multi award winning creative team, a cast of over 50 West End stars and an orchestra made up of the best musicians the West End has to offer, enjoy the biggest celebration of musicals this summer.
title: The Show Must Go On! - Live at the Palace Theatre
